Care giver performance monitoring
1
Unlocked visibility into Care Giver’s operational performance for the leadership 
team to track schedule fulfillment, lost revenue opportunities and efficiency at 
multiple cuts by automating data ingestion using Alteryx and building Tableau 
based dashboards
In-Home care service provider

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking to provide visibility into operational performance of the Care Givers which were on eRSP (EMR) reports.  Currently, 
these reports are manual, subject to ad hoc changes, available at a weekly/monthly level in a fixed format and are missing 
historical trends.  
In-home care service provider needs to monitor care giver’s 
performance 
2
Your value is enhanced. 
You have automated the extraction and enabled granular reporting that eliminated~ 2 hours of daily manual effort and improved 
the precision of reporting. You also have improved the tracking on operational performance of the Care Givers to enable the 
leadership to improve the efficiency. Improved tracking of the reasons for zero-claim hours unlocked insights to take relevant 
measures to improve patient experience and prevent revenue loss.
CARE GIVER PERFORMANCE 
MONITORING 
KEY RESULT   
•
2 hours/day of manual 
effort saved
•
Cost savings of $20K 
per month
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Alteryx Workflows
•
Tableau Dashboards
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to provide visibility into Care Giver’s operational performance for the leadership team to track 
schedule fulfillment, lost revenue opportunities and efficiency at multiple cuts by automating data ingestion using Alteryx and 
building Tableau based dashboards, including:
1)
Setting up automated ingestion of EMR data from eRSP using Alteryx workflows to clean , transform and harmonize the data to 
a reportable form.
2) Providing visibility into Fulfilment Rate by tracking the percentage of the actual hours served against the scheduled hours and 
improved granularity across multiple attributes like Payor, Region, Branch, Visit Type etc.
3) Tracking zero claim hours with associated reasons highlighting the missed revenue opportunity due to scheduled but unserved 
hours due to cancellations, no-shows etc.
4) Calculating the ‘Gross Margin %’ for Care Givers and other attributes by comparing the revenue generated against the wages 
and providing insights into seasonality and profitability across various data cuts.

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Set up automated ingestion of EMR data from eRSP using Alteryx workflows to clean , transform and harmonize the data to a reportable form
•
Provided visibility into Fulfilment Rate by tracking the percentage of the actual hours served against the scheduled hours 
•
Tracked Zero Claim Hours with associated reasons highlighting the missed revenue opportunity due to scheduled but unserved hours due to cancellations, 
no-shows etc.
•
Calculated the ‘Gross Margin %’ for Care Givers and other attributes by comparing the revenue generated against the wages and providing insights into 
seasonality and profitability across various data cuts
Situation
•
Client had limited visibility into operational performance of the Care Givers and they relied on eRSP (EMR) reports for the same. However, the reports were 
manual, subject to ad hoc changes, available at a weekly/monthly level in a fixed format and were missing historical trends. 
•
Partnered with the client to develop the comprehensive logic to provide enhanced visibility the operational health by automating Alteryx workflows and 
building tableau-based dashboards. The refresh cadence was enhanced to a daily level and improved the granularity across multiple attributes like Payor, 
Region, Branch, Visit Type etc. 
Care giver performance monitoring for an in-home care service 
provider 
3
Impact
•
Automated the extraction and enabled granular reporting eliminated~ 2 hours of daily manual effort and improved the precision of reporting
•
Improved the tracking on operational performance of the Care Givers to enable the leadership to improve the efficiency. Improved tracking of the reasons for 
zero-claim hours unlocked insights to take relevant measures to improve patient experience, and prevent revenue loss
Care giver performance 
monitoring

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Approach - High level data flow
4
Source systems
Data Prep, Transformation, Validation
Data Storage
Flat Files (Mapping 
Files) 
Data Visualization
Data Extraction 
Data 
Cleansing
Transform
Business 
Rules
Consolidation
Direct data extraction from eRSP (EMR system) and Flat files
Extracted data is stored within Azure SQL server
Raw data stored in Azure SQL server are cleaned and transformed as per business specific rules discussed with client Team
The cleaned and transformed data are stored in Clean and Reporting tables within Azure SQL server
Data stored in Azure SQL server is used for creating dashboards in Tableau
